author: sboag
msg: Since the free method is not synchronized, do setLength before
the object is freed.  Fix attributed to Peter Speck <speck@ruc.dk>.

author: garyp
msg: If no ErrorListener is set, obtain one from the owner, if available.  Otherwise, create a default one.

author: garyp
msg: Fix check for namespace nodes.  Avoid object creation for empty string.

author: garyp
msg: Change signature for equals(QName) method to equals(Object) to properly override Object.equals for equal compares.
Problem showed up in a hashtable.get() which was failing to find an object in the table.
